migraine.advice: Avoid bright lights, rest in a quiet room, and use prescribed pain relief.

hypertension.advice: Reduce salt intake and avoid stress. Consult a doctor if readings are high.

anemia.advice: Eat iron-rich foods and follow up with your doctor for supplements.

drug reaction.advice: Stop taking any non-essential medication and consult a doctor immediately.

acne.advice: Maintain a regular skincare routine and avoid oily foods.

flu.advice: Rest, drink plenty of fluids, and consider over-the-counter flu medication.

covid-19.advice: Isolate, rest, and monitor oxygen levels. Seek care if breathing becomes difficult.
